inference: Final Answer: $\boxed{8\pi}$. I hope it is correct.
ground_truth: The circumference of the whole circle is $2 \pi \cdot 4 = 8 \pi$.  Then the circumference of the base of the cone is \[\frac{270^\circ}{360^\circ} \cdot 8 \pi = \boxed{6 \pi}.\]
